actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two Thorny Rapiers or one Thorny Rapier and one Grappelvine Whip.

actions.name: Thorny Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage + 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Grapplevine Whip
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, 10 ft., one target, 9 (2d4+4) slashing damage. If target is holding a weapon it must make DC 14 Str save or drop the weapon. If it is holding more than one weapon it drops only one.

special_abilities.name: Plant Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: Advantage on Dex (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

special_abilities.name: Tearful Stench
special_abilities.desc: Each creature other than an alliumite within 5 ft. of alliumite when it takes damage: DC 14 Con save or be blinded until start of creature's next turn. On a successful save creature is immune to Tearful Stench of all alliumites for 1 min.
